properties.areaDesc: Scotts Bluff; Dawes; East Laramie County; Banner; South Sioux
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 2 at 2:37PM MST until February 4 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...SIGNIFICANT SNOW ACCUMULATIONS EXPECTED SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH
MONDAY FOR EAST CENTRAL THROUGH SOUTH CENTRAL WYOMING...

* WHAT...Snow and areas of freezing drizzle expected. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts on
the north facing ridges.

* WHERE...Along a line from Pine Bluffs Wyoming northeast to
Chadron.

* WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 5 PM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions
could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow or freezing
drizzle will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery
roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while driving.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY
